mapper.insert: insert into db_return_instorage (SEQUENCEID, RETURNSID, ORDERID, PRODUCTID, ORDERNUM, RETURNNUM, INNUM, OPER, OPERTIME, FLAG, FLAGDESCR, COSTPRICE, AMOUNT, MANUFACTUREID, MANUFACTURE, PRODUCTNAME, DESCR) values (#{sequenceid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{returnsid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{orderid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{productid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ordernum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{returnnum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{innum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{oper,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{opertime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{flag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{flagdescr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{costprice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{amount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{manufactureid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{manufacture,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{productname,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{descr,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
mapper.update: update db_return_instorage set RETURNSID = #{returnsid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ORDERID = #{orderid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PRODUCTID = #{productid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORDERNUM = #{ordernum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, RETURNNUM = #{returnnum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, INNUM = #{innum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, OPER = #{oper,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPERTIME = #{opertime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, FLAG = #{flag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FLAGDESCR = #{flagdescr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COSTPRICE = #{costprice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, AMOUNT = #{amount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, MANUFACTUREID = #{manufactureid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MANUFACTURE = #{manufacture,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PRODUCTNAME = #{productname,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, DESCR = #{descr,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where SEQUENCEID = #{sequenceid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.select: select SEQUENCEID, RETURNSID, ORDERID, PRODUCTID, ORDERNUM, RETURNNUM, INNUM, OPER, OPERTIME, FLAG, FLAGDESCR, COSTPRICE, AMOUNT, MANUFACTUREID, MANUFACTURE, PRODUCTNAME, DESCR from db_return_instorage where SEQUENCEID = #{sequenceid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

select SEQUENCEID, RETURNSID, ORDERID, PRODUCTID, ORDERNUM, RETURNNUM, INNUM, OPER, OPERTIME, FLAG, FLAGDESCR, COSTPRICE, AMOUNT, MANUFACTUREID, MANUFACTURE, PRODUCTNAME, DESCR from db_return_instorage
